divs: sighting detailson monday night (04\04\2011) i was on my front patio watching the stars at 2200 hrs, and saw a very bright star-like object hovering what looked like about 1000 feet. i got my telescope out to look at it closer, and noticed that it was circular with rotating white, blue, green and red lights around the sides of it. i watched it for about 10 minutes before it disappeared over the santa cruz mountains. the area where i saw it was west of the quarry in cuppertino. before it disappeared, i also saw it shooting short bursts of what looked like blue lightning from the bottom of it. this repeated again tuesday night, same time and area, and lasted about 10 minutes. last night (weds 04\06\2011), it was different. i saw a very bright star-like object hovering over the same area (over the cuppertino quarry). it was too low to be a "star", but hovering so it wasn't a plane either. i got my tele out again to take a look at it, and it was definatly a triangle with bright lights (one at each tip of the triangle). it moved slightly to the left, then right, but hovered over the same area. as i was watching it through my tele, the lights all went out on it, but you could see four "dots" of lights lined up next to it. then, while i was still looking through my tele, the three bright white lights came back on. i watched it for about 15 minutes, then the lights went out again, and didn't come back on. at this point, the line of "dots" also disappeared from view. now that the weather is starting to get warmer, i am going to start camping outside on the weekends to keep a good watch on the sky. to my friends and family, i have been refering to these objects as "my friends". as in, "my friends are back!". and no..... i would never use a flashlight or laser to try to get their attention!!!
Summary: Third night in a row..... yes, again!
